carbon.shadow

Interface ShadowView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppBarLayout, AutoCompleteEditText, AutoCompleteLayout, BottomBar, BottomSheet, Button, CheckBox, CheckedTextView, Chip, CollapsingToolbarLayout, ConstraintLayout, CoordinatorLayout, DrawerLayout, DropDown, EditText, ExpansionPanel, FastLayout, FloatingActionButton, FlowLayout, FrameLayout, GridLayout, ImageView, InputLayout, LinearLayout, MarshmallowEditText, RadioButton, RadioGroup, RelativeLayout, SearchEditText, Snackbar, TableLayout, TextView, Toolbar

    • Method Detail

      • getElevation

        float getElevation()
        Gets the elevation.
        Returns:
        the elevation value.

      • setElevation

        void setElevation(float elevation)
        Sets the elevation value. There are useful values of elevation defined in xml as carbon_elevationFlat, carbon_elevationLow, carbon_elevationMedium, carbon_elevationHigh, carbon_elevationMax
        Parameters:
        elevation - can be from range [0 - 25]
